评论详情: Looks exactly like the picture. The design is neat and I wear it very often. My only complaint is that I wish they made an extra small size. It's also pretty thin. Everything is nowadays though tbh so, good shirt mostly!
My boyfriend looked amazing in this. Light weight nd very good looking.
Arrived just like photo, very comfortable and very hip! I loooooooooooove the design and fit, and you will, too!
The quality can be better
Great look over all, just a little thin for my taste, but definitely a good evening out shirt.

A million and one reviews are out there with vague language like "normally I wear a medium but I bought this and it was too different." Simply measure yourself, really, it isn't hard and it vastly increases your chances of getting the right fit. I measured myself and bought the shirt size that fits closest to my measurements, and it fits great. This product runs true to the measurements. Decent value. The shirt is somewhat thin, polyester material. That is not necessarily a bad thing. It was actually exactly what I was looking for. The design and color are great, not faded and light like some poly material products can be. Well worth it for me.
Fits a bit large, a bit thin fabric, conferrable, doesn't seem to rinckle easy, no pilling
Fit is a bit small, but it's super cute and comfy. Great under a black underbust corset.
Son needed for a Beetlejuice cosplay. Looked great. Runs a bit small.
It’s just my size and the design is the same as it was in its preview, 10/10!!!
it fit me correctly! i usually get a medium/large in shirts and i got medium this time not knowing how big it was gonna be and it was awesome.
It fits as expected. It is 100% polyester so it feels almost halloween costume like, BUT it is a nice shirt.
The shirt is very stylish. It drew people's attention. I liked it a lot.
Super nice looking shirt but def runs SMAAAAALL of course if you’re small yourself you won’t run into that issue. Def buy a bigger size!
It fit good

I really like the shirt style. Very unique and different, received a lot of compliments on it. My only big issue is that it arrived in a see-through bag, so everyone could see exactly what I was getting. I guess they don't call it "TheyLook" for nothing. *shrugs*

Bueno por el precio esperaba un poco más realmente hay más prendas por ese precio que llenan mis espectativas Las costuras no están tan bien la  tela es un poco barata la  camisa me quedo grande realmente creo que debería de decir que es talla M no S  esta muy grande los colores es lo único que me gustan muy vivos como en la imagen

the fabric this shirt is made of feels a bit like a walmart halloween costume honestly. its very slippery and synthetic feeling, almost like a non-stretchy swimsuit material. the sewing is also a bit uneven and ripply, especially in the sleeves. im not sure if i can actually wear this out of my house without feeling a bit self conscious about how poor quality it looks close up unfortunately.  if you dont mind the fabric and stitching quality, then i do recommend this; its a very cool design and fits true to size, but im probably more likely to take it apart to use as a sewing pattern to remake it in better fabric

评论概述: Nice looking shirt, but quality is meh.
评论详情: Its a very nice and cool looking shirt, got a ton of compliments. Looks great for photos,, but the fabric used to make the shirt seems low budget. Feels like the same fabric as bathing shorts and swimming outfits,, like that plasticky feeling, swimming trunks have lol not the worst but just wanted the purchaser to be aware. otherwise, this shirt does look cool in photos :)
Liked the shirt but it did not fit ...so order a larger size! I ordered a XL but needed a 2X..
I got lots of compliments and felt a lot of gender euphoria. Felt like I was the ultimate gender man: Ranboo.
